name: ROWBYROW
description:
overworld: arrow or mouse controls

encounter: mouse controls. left-click to fill in squares, right-click to mark as empty. 

normal Picross rules apply: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nonogram#Example

you can only fill in one row/column at a time. 

the (bracketed numbers) indicate how many squares you can click for a successful attack/spell.
